issues.title: [MARKETING] Create Lead Magnet System - 5 Audience-Specific Guides
issues.body:
## Problem

Site has newsletter popup but lacks strategic lead magnets for different audiences (creatives, corporate, community organizers, journalists, Indigenous leaders).

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Missing 200-400 leads/month per magnet
- No audience segmentation
- Generic positioning

## Recommended Lead Magnets

1. "Humanizing Tech in the AI Age" (general)
2. "Creative Technologist's Toolkit" (creatives)
3. "Community Building Playbook" (organizers)
4. "AI for Media Professionals" (journalists)
5. "Indigenous AI Sovereignty Framework" (Indigenous leaders)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] 5 lead magnets created (10-15 pages each)
- [ ] Landing pages with email capture
- [ ] Email automation sequences setup
- [ ] 200-400 leads/month per magnet
- [ ] Conversion tracking implemented

issues.title: [MARKETING] Launch Podcast Guesting Tour Strategy
issues.body:

- [ ] Speaking inquiries tracked

issues.title: [MARKETING] Implement Email Onboarding Sequences
issues.body:
## Problem

No automated email sequences for new subscribers. Missing opportunity to nurture leads and convert to community/customers.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - 15-25% conversion opportunity missed
- No lead nurturing
- High unsubscribe rates

## Required Sequences

1. New subscriber (5 emails/14 days)
2. Lead magnet download (10 emails/30 days)
3. Event attendee (5 emails/30 days)
4. Workshop inquiry (7 emails/14 days)
5. Blog subscriber (weekly)
6. Re-engagement (4 emails)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] 6 email sequences created
- [ ] Automation rules configured
- [ ] 15-25% conversion to paid/community
- [ ] Email platform integrated
- [ ] A/B testing implemented

issues.title: [MARKETING] Social Media Amplification System
issues.body:
## Problem

Blog posts published but not systematically repurposed for social media. Missing 10x reach opportunity.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM-HIGH** - Content reach limited
- Social engagement low

## Repurposing Strategy

Each blog post becomes:
- LinkedIn article + 3-4 posts
- Twitter thread (5-10 tweets)
- TikTok/IG Reels (2-3 clips)
- Instagram Stories (daily)
- Pinterest pins (2-3)
- Email snippet

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Repurposing workflow documented
- [ ] Tools selected (Buffer, Canva)
- [ ] 10-15 pieces per blog post
- [ ] 3-5x social reach
- [ ] Content calendar 4 weeks ahead
